name: Unhealthy Study Habits Simulator
description:
Uh oh! Lois watched anime all week, and didn't study for their final exam. Lois needs your help optimizing their study habits so they can get an A+ and pass the course. Good luck!

Made for the CSSA Game Jam 2021 at the University of Manitoba in less than 48 hours. The theme for the game jam was "Don't Stop Moving". Developed in Unity.

Developed by:

  • Thomas Bautista
  • Caleb Benyon
  • John Manning
  • Mark Robitaille
  • Ceilidh Simon

Special thanks to Glen Manning for creating the title screen artwork.
